item.title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion demo now available for PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Play through two levels with nine heroes.

A demo for MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is now available for PC via Steam as part of Steam Next Fest: October 2025 Edition, publisher Dotemu and developer Tribute Games announced.

Here is an overview of the demo and game, via Dotemu:

Demo Features

  • Two Levels – Blast through the bustling streets of New York City and take the fight to the Helicarrier levels.
  • Choose from Nine Heroes – Unleash iconic moves and experiment with epic duos. Swing in as Spider-Man, slash through as Wolverine, smash as She-Hulk, or rain down lightning as Storm. Other playable heroes include Venom, Nova, Phyla-Vell, Rocket Raccoon, and Captain America.
  • Local and Online Cooperative Play – Team up with a friend on the couch or assemble from across the globe.
  • Steam Deck – Take the MARVEL Cosmic Invasion with you on the go, as this demo is fully playable on Steam Deck.

About the Game

In MARVEL Cosmic Invasion, the immortal Super Villain Annihilus has launched an unprecedented attack across the galaxy, threatening all life as we know it. Choose and control your own team of two characters while tagging between them mid-fight with the innovative Cosmic Swap system, capitalizing on distinct superpowers and special attacks to create unique team-ups and dish out devastating damage. After setting the bar for arcade-inspired beat ‘em ups with the acclaimed, multimillion-selling smash hit Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge, Dotemu and Tribute Games modernize the timeless fun of brawlers with exciting tag-team fighting and a multi-era celebration of the most iconic comic book universe in MARVEL Cosmic Invasion.

MARVEL Cosmic Invasion is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam in 2025.

item.title: LIFTED launches in Q1 2026 for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

2.5D puzzle platformer gets a release window.

2.5D puzzle platformer LIFTED, formerly Ari Buktu and the Anytime Elevator, will launch for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam in Q1 2026, developer Adventure Works announced. It will support English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Slovak, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, and Simplified Chinese language options. A demo is available now for PC.

Here is a brief overview of the game, via Adventure Works:

Embark on an epic race through time in LIFTED, the wild and wacky cinematic puzzle-platforming adventure from former Disney Imagineer Jeffrey Ashbrook and his company Adventure Works.

Step into the inquisitive shoes of Ari Buktu, a cool and curious lad simply looking for some extra credit in Professor Lionel Raventhorpe’s science class. Witness the unlikely pair travel through history in an immersive journey full of heart, humor, and imagination.

Platform through ancient Egypt and Mayan ruins to find a beautiful tiara for the Professor’s lady love. Evade pirates, solve perplexing puzzles, and beat history’s most notorious troublemakers to the treasure.
